basics.name: Sollie Garcia
basics.label: Student / Code Monkey
basics.summary: I am currently studying Information and Computer Science at University of Hawaii at Manoa and a Web and Design Assistant at DCDC Hawaii.

work.summary: Assist with full stack rails development on an ongoing project known as Hawaiian Assessment; a platform for creating, proctoring, and scoring standardized exams for Native Hawaiian immersion schools.
highlights: Implement new features such as practice sample exam platform
Assist in code review, testing, and bug fixing
Record data genetically modified black tiger shrimp.
Care for the shrimp including feeding, water purification, and cleaning.
Know over 300 songs, able to play at request.
Set up, mixing, sound checks and preformance experience.

volunteer.summary:
Volunteer services including Iron Man booths, Kona Marathon setup/cleanup, native forest restoration,
    Special Olympics staff,
    miscellaneous community events.
highlights: Cook a meal once a month for over 150 families at an event called 'Meet and Eat
Hand water and food to participants in the Iron Man triathlon.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
